# Home work model - non linear

Define the model 

```{r model}
model = function(timepoint, state, parameters) { 
  with(as.list(c(state, parameters)), {
    ds1 = V0 - k1 * s1 
    ds2 = k1 * s1 - (V2 * s2) / (1 + s2) 
    list(c(ds1, ds2))
  }) 
}
```




#Analysis
Plot flow field, null clines and one trajectory

```{r run_model}


# for setting the axis limits
xlim = c(-10, 20) 
ylim = c(-10, 20)


pars = c(V0 = 1.1, k1 = 0.1, V2 = 1.5)

# draw vector field
model.flowField = flowField(xlab = "s1", ylab = "s2", model, 
                            xlim = xlim, ylim = ylim, 
                            parameters = pars, 
                            points = 19, add = FALSE, 
                            state.names = c("s1", "s2"))

# draw nullclines
model.nullclines = nullclines(model, xlim = xlim, ylim = ylim,
                              parameters = pars,
                              points = 500, state.names = c("s1", "s2"))

# draw trajectory
model.trajectory = trajectory(model, y0 = c(-10, 10), tlim = c(0, 40), 
                              parameters = pars, state.names = c("s1", "s2"))
model.trajectory = trajectory(model, y0 = c(21, 10), tlim = c(0, 40), 
                              parameters = pars, state.names = c("s1", "s2"))
model.trajectory = trajectory(model, y0 = c(20, -10), tlim = c(0, 40), 
                              parameters = pars, state.names = c("s1", "s2"))
model.trajectory = trajectory(model, y0 = c(0, 0), tlim = c(0, 40), 
                              parameters = pars, state.names = c("s1", "s2"))
```

# Calulate the x and y over time 
```{r}
# perform numerical simulation and plot end result
model.numericalSolution = numericalSolution(model, y0 = c(0, 0), 
                                            tlim = c(0, 100), type = "one",
                                            parameters = pars,
                                            state.names = c("s1", "s2"),
                                            col = c("green", "orange"), 
                                            ylim = ylim, add.legend = F)
# make legend for plot
legend("topright", col = c("green", "orange"), legend = c("x", "y"), lty = 1)


```
